title: Merriment and Mortification
desc: Hello Beauties, You have been hand selected to join us for an evening of  Merriment and Mortification  at  Otto's Shrunken Head Tiki Bar and Lounge . This is a  FREE SHOW!  No cover. But please get a drink to make the bar happy!! Drink special $6 PBR with a house Whiskey shot. In the spirit of Merriment, this show will feature best and brightest comic's NYC has to offer. Everyone gets Lei'd (ain't too proud to pun)!!! It is a Tiki Bar after all. We have fun gift bags and giveaway?s!! The Rundown! 6:15pm Seating 6:30 pm Show Cover Charge: $0.00 Drink Min: 0 Chance of Merriment or Mortification:100% +/- 2% The show is Free, however all of the goodies you are reciving were paid for by our? generous audiances. Please donate what you can. #Payitforward
